text: Sīmǎ Yán (司馬炎) is the personal name of Emperor Wu of Jin, the founding monarch of Jin dynasty (265–420). Sima Yan also refers to: *Sīmǎ Yǎn (司馬演), eleventh son of Emperor Wu of Jin; *Sīmǎ Yàn (司馬晏), another son of Emperor Wu of Jin and father of Emperor Min of Jin; *Sīmǎ Yǎn (司馬衍), personal name of Emperor Cheng of Jin.
title: Sima Yan (disambiguation)
